meanings.definition: A substance produced by the stomach that is converted into pepsin by the action of hydrochloric acid.
meanings.sent1: The stomach produces pepsinogen to help with digestion.
meanings.sent2: After the meal, pepsinogen is converted into pepsin by stomach acid.
meanings.sent3: The pepsinogen in the stomach had a dance-off with the hydrochloric acid.
meanings.sent4: Their teamwork was like pepsinogen and hydrochloric acid working together.
meanings.sent5: The pepsinogen journeyed through the stomach, transforming into pepsin along the way.
